exercises.explanation: Days of the week should always be capitalized.

exercises.explanation: Months and proper nouns should always be capitalized.

exercises.explanation: Use subject pronouns (I, he, she, we, they) when they are the subject of the sentence.

sections.title: Capitalization Rules
sections.description: Learn when to capitalize words in English

examples.sentence: john lives in new york with mary.
examples.answer: John lives in New York with Mary.
examples.explanation: Always capitalize names of people and places

examples.sentence: she was born in {given}, but moved to france in {answer}.

sections.title: Pronoun Usage
sections.description: Learn how to use pronouns correctly in sentences

examples.explanation: Use subject pronouns when they are the subject of the sentence

examples.sentence: The teacher asked {given} and {answer} to help.
examples.explanation: Use object pronouns when they are the object of the sentence
